name: Pig Lebowski
description:
You're a piggybank that needs to kill everybody. A piggybank can't move, but luckly for you this one can't break. Take advantage of this by getting shot by the enemy. Take out the enemys in the correct order, and collect the thumbs-up coin along the way.

How to play:

The aim of the game is to defeat all enemies in a stage, when you do so the stage is completed. Optionally you can also collect the coin by shooting it which is (badly) hidden in each level. You cannot move by yourself but you are indestructable and can be moved around by getting shot.

At the start of each stage you have a planning period where you can get an overlook of enemy placements and plan ahead your moves.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 in one and a half day by:
tdog900 (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEUfRJy168DG0bj77pB-Xjw)
andesyv (https://github.com/andesyv)
